column5: Emma the Airstream is a 28' 1983 restored Excella. This is Glamping but inside the city and all the comforts of home. She is one lovely lady, perfectly updated. Relax in the yard, all set up for hanging out and winding down. Sleeps two. You are going to love this electric, close-in area which will allow you to quickly get anywhere in Dallas that you want to go. Good for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers. Need more space try The Teeny Tiny House in Little Forest Hills.
